pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyzing Real-Time Quantitative PCR Data // Calculates the amplification efficiency and curves from real-time quantitative PCR (Polymerase Chain Reaction) data. Estimates the relative expression from PCR data using the double delta CT and the standard curve methods Livak Schmittgen (2001) doi:10.1006/meth.2001.1262. Tests for statistical significance using two-group tests and linear regression Yuan et al. (2006) doi: 10.1186/1471-2105-7-85.
